TERMINATION OF SERVICE. Upon cessation of aNon-EmployeeDirector’s service as a member of the Board for any reason other than death, any of theNon-EmployeeDirector’s Options (or any portion thereof) that is not then vested shall terminate, and theNon-EmployeeDirector shall have no rights with respect to, or in respect of, such terminated Options. If theNon-EmployeeDirector ceases to serve as a member of the Board due to his or her death, theNon-EmployeeDirector’s Options shall fully vest as of the date of theNon-EmployeeDirector’s death.
